name: Survey of Forms: Creative Nonfiction
description: The National Endowment for the Arts defines 'creative nonfiction' as 'factual prose that is also literary.' In this survey course, students will read a wide range of work that falls into this lively genre, including memoir, travel writing, the personal essay, and nature writing. Weekly writing assignments will give students the chance to work on short pieces of their own creative nonfiction.
